posts.title: The Future of Web Development
posts.excerpt: Exploring the latest trends in PWA and client-side rendering.
posts.content:
Web development is evolving at a rapid pace. With the advent of PWAs (Progressive Web Apps), we are seeing a shift towards more native-like experiences on the web. This post explores how Vite and Service Workers are changing the game.

We can now build applications that work offline, send push notifications, and install directly to the user's home screen, all with standard web technologies.

posts.title: Understanding CSS Grid
posts.excerpt: A comprehensive guide to mastering modern layouts.
posts.content:
CSS Grid has revolutionized how we think about layout on the web. Gone are the days of float hacks and clearing elements. With Grid, we can create complex, 2-dimensional layouts with ease.

In this tutorial, we will walk through the basic concepts of grid-template-columns, grid-template-rows, and grid-area.

posts.title: JavaScript ES6+ Features
posts.excerpt: Enhance your code with modern JavaScript syntax.
posts.content:
JavaScript has come a long way since the days of ES5. Features like Arrow Functions, Destructuring, Spread Operator, and Async/Await have made the language more expressive and easier to write.

Let's dive into some distinct examples of how these features can clean up your codebase.
